overview: Jack comes to the office looking to interview for a new secretary, Britney is not qualified to be a secretary she's takes great dick-tation.  Capri and Marie return home for shopping at the mall, Marie tells Capri she is not good with boys, Capri teaches her how to kiss and more.  Lucius comes over to pick up his video game from Dane. Lucky for Lucius, Diamond wants to play with his joystick.  Marie wants to use her new found kissing skills.. what better way to try it than on Capri's dad Tommy!  Dane is returning a video game he borrow from Lucius.. only to find his mom Mrs, Tate home alone and horny.
title: Filthy Family
